comments.body:
This can be simplified as:
```
search_strs = ['^Cisco (.+) \(revision', '^[Cc]isco (\S+).+bytes of .*memory']
for item in search_strs:
   match = re.search(r'%s' % item, data, re.M)
   if match:
       device_info['network_os_model'] = match.group(1)
       break
```
